Container.Name: StashSense
Container.Overview: AI-powered performer identification for Stash using face recognition against StashDB. Requires NVIDIA GPU with nvidia-container-toolkit for best performance (CPU fallback available).

Config.Name: API Port
Config.Description: Port for the Stash Sense API

Config.Name: Stash URL
Config.Description: URL to your Stash instance (e.g., http://192.168.1.100:9999)

Config.Name: Stash API Key
Config.Description: Stash API key (Settings → Security → API Key)

Config.Name: Data Directory
Config.Description: Path to database files (face_facenet.voy, performers.json, etc.)

Config.Name: Model Cache
Config.Description: Model weights cache (speeds up container restarts)

Config.Name: NVIDIA Devices
Config.Description: GPU selection: 'all' or specific GPU UUID
